truyen.gioi_thieu: Ultra sensitive body doesn't listen anymore!!! The game(?) of robbing and being robbed between rich presidents family which owns a sensitive body and the poor people which only has body begins!

truyen.ten: my sister has amnesia - what's sex?
truyen.the_loai: Comedy, Drama, Ecchi, Harem, Mature, Romance, Seinen, Smut, Webtoons
truyen.ten_truyen: my sister has amnesia - what's sex?
truyen.gioi_thieu: I want to continue to hold sister could not bear ... lost memories and H Love Love Life!

truyen.the_loai: Comedy, Drama, Romance, School life, Shounen ai, Supernatural, Webtoons
truyen.gioi_thieu: One man has three wives? What's the deal with this greedy guy?

In ancient times, all of the demons recorded in the Classic of Mountains and Seas really existed. They absorbed humankind's thoughts to become more powerful. As time passed, people gradually forgot about their existence. The demons that were forgotten were all faced with the fate of disappearing... there is a family that serves to guard and protect the only demon remaining in the world. As they painted and recorded, they were - the artists of the Classic of Mountains and Seas.

truyen.ten: mowang yu yongzhe yu sheng jian shendian
truyen.the_loai: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Romance, Shounen.
truyen.ten_truyen: mowang yu yongzhe yu sheng jian shendian
truyen.gioi_thieu: The continent of RAIEO was once ravaged by the Demon King and the Demon Race, in the darkest of times a Brave Knight carried a Sacred Sword saved the continent. After 300 years of peace, with the Sacred Sword now gone and the Sacred Sword Temple being occupied by the Demon Race, the continent of RAIEO is once again at war. Thus, our protagonist together with his donkey and a mysterious girl embark on a journey to stop the Demon King and the Demon Race.

truyen.the_loai: Comedy, Romance, Shoujo., Slice of life
truyen.tac_gia: Mao Si Er, San Fu Animation
truyen.gioi_thieu: Su Shuang Shuang comes home one day to find that someone has moved into the apartment next to hers. When curiosity gets the best of her and she goes in to meet her neighbour, a handsome guys comes out of the shower? And he calls the police?

truyen.tac_gia: Brian Michael Bendis, Tom King, Scott Snyder, James Tynion IV, Joshua Williamson, Jose Luis Garcia-Lopez, Jorge Jimenez, Clay Mann
truyen.gioi_thieu: DC Nation features three brand-new stories from a lineup of superstar talent that will appear only in this comic book and will not be reprinted in another comic book before each series' collected editions.-and each tale serves as a prelude to some of the biggest DC events of 2018!

truyen.tac_gia: Al Ewing, Joe Bennett, Alex Ross
truyen.gioi_thieu: HORROR HAS A NAME. You'd never notice the man. He doesn't like to be noticed. He's quiet. Calm. Never complains. If someone were to walk up and shoot him in the head... all he'd do is die. Until night falls. And someone else gets up again. The man's name is Banner. The horror is THE IMMORTAL HULK.

truyen.tac_gia: Brian Michael Bendis, Jason Fabok, Ivan Reis
truyen.gioi_thieu: A new era begins for Superman as a threat from his earliest origins reemerges to destroy the Last Son of Krypton. As Superman struggles to come to grips with what has happened to his wife and son, he must also face a new threat that's determined to burn down Metropolis!

truyen.the_loai: Comedy, Drama, Psychological, Sci-fi, Seinen, Slice of life
truyen.gioi_thieu: One night in 2006, when they were young, the two brothers Mutta (born 1993) and Hibito (born 1996) saw what appeared to be a UFO heading for the moon. They decided that night to both become astronauts and travel out into space. In 2025, Hibito has become an astronaut, and he's going to go to the moon. Mutta ended up following a more traditional career path with an auto development company. However, Mutta just ruined his career through a violent altercation with his boss. Now, not only has he lost his job, he appears to be blacklisted in the entire industry. Maybe this is a rare opportunity for Mutta to once again chase his childhood dream and become an astronaut like his little brother! Nominated for the 2nd and 3rd Manga Taisho Award and won the 56th Shogakukan Manga Award and 35th Kodansha Manga Award in the General Category.

truyen.ten: saenai kanojo no sodatekata - koisuru metronome
truyen.the_loai: Comedy, Drama, Romance, School life, Seinen
truyen.ten_truyen: saenai kanojo no sodatekata - koisuru metronome
truyen.gioi_thieu: Famed author Kasumigaoka Utaha had always struggled with her novel series, 'Koisuru Metronome' until she met Tomoyo Aki; her biggest fan who inspires her to give it a proper conclusion and later becomes her personal editor. Now with Tomoya's passion and Kasumigaoka's determination combined, the two work together on their latest series while also discovering their true feelings and finding parallels between themselves and the characters within Kasumigaoka's novels.

truyen.the_loai: Action, Drama, Harem, Mature, School life, Shounen., Supernatural, Yuri
truyen.gioi_thieu: Balud Cornelius is the son of a noble of the Mauricia kingdom and inside him also dwell the souls of the niggardly warring states commander Oka Sadatoshi and animal ear otaku high schooler Oka Masaharu. With these 3 souls in a single body, he can exhibit extraordinary abilities when it comes to combat or managing the domain.

Deadpool's quest to beat the rest continues, and this time he's squaring off against the Assassins Guild in the Big Easy! The Merc with the Mouth's healing factor will get put to the ultimate test when he's pitted against the knife-wielding speedster called HARVESTER! But even if he's lucky enough to survive that encounter, Deadpool's actions in this very comics mag will align more than one ne'er-do-well against him... and Harvester'll look like a walk in the park!

truyen.tac_gia: Jeff Lemire, Ivan Reis, Joe Prado, Marcelo Maiolo
truyen.gioi_thieu: Bound together by fate, united by the spirit of exploration and hope for tomorrow, the Terrifics bound from the Dark Multiverse of Meta! When Mr. Terrific, Metamorpho, Plastic Man and Phantom Girl find themselves literally bound together by a tragic accident, our team of unlikely allies must rely on one another to make their way back home. But a startling revelation on their return trip brings them face to face with a new mystery: where in the universe is Tom Strong?

truyen.ten: hunt for wolverine: mystery in madripoor
truyen.ten_truyen: hunt for wolverine: mystery in madripoor
truyen.tac_gia: Jim Zub, Thony Silas, Greg Land
truyen.gioi_thieu: WHAT MAYHEM HAS THE RETURN OF THE MUTANT WITH METAL CLAWS CAUSED IN MADRIPOOR? When Wolverine's former alter-ego Patch is sighted on the streets of Madripoor, the infamous island of ill-repute, Kitty Pryde pulls together a group of Logan's closest friends to try and find him: Storm, Rogue, Psylocke, Domino, and Jubilee. What they discover is a twisted cabal of crime and dark mysteries that will take these X-Men from the depths of Lowtown to the stars circling overhead in the Hunt For Wolverine.

truyen.the_loai: Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Harem, Romance
truyen.gioi_thieu: Balud Cornelius is the son of a noble of the Mauricia kingdom and inside him also dwell the souls of the niggardly warring states commander Oka Sadatoshi and animal ear otaku high schooler Oka Masaharu. With these 3 souls in a single body, he can exhibit extraordinary abilities when it comes to combat or managing the domain.
The princess of the human kingdom has been kidnapped by the demon king! But all she wants to do is get a good night's sleep!?

truyen.the_loai: Action, Adult, Comedy, Drama, Ecchi, Martial arts, Mature, Psychological, Romance, Seinen, Tragedy
truyen.gioi_thieu: Ken is a Japanese man, and Ken's love interest Yumin moves to Korea to become a police officer. He then decides to follow her to also become a police officer but instead ends up becoming the leader of a small Korean gang. What will happend to Ken?

truyen.ten: the brave and the bold: batman and wonder woman
truyen.ten_truyen: the brave and the bold: batman and wonder woman
truyen.gioi_thieu: Don't miss the start of a new, six-issue miniseries written and illustrated by Liam Sharp (WONDER WOMAN)! When a Celtic god's murder leads to a war between the fairy folk and a possible breach between worlds, Wonder Woman must find the murderer and keep the peace while Batman investigates strange occurrences in Gotham City. As Diana must turn to the World's Greatest Detective for help, the two heroes quickly learn their cases may be connected.

truyen.tac_gia: Jim Zub, Emilio Laiso, Clayton Crain
truyen.gioi_thieu: SPINNING OUT FROM THE FALLOUT OF THE BATTLE FOR THE POWER STONE IN THE PAGES OF INFINITY COUNTDOWN! The Champions head to space to save the Nova Corps and stop Warbringer, but other forces are moving against them... These young heroes are in for the fight of their lives!

truyen.ten: iron maiden: legacy of the beast
truyen.ten_truyen: iron maiden: legacy of the beast
truyen.tac_gia: Ian Edginton, Llexi Leon, Kevin West, Jason Gorder
truyen.gioi_thieu: When dark forces conspire to corrupt the fabric of reality, Eddie's immortal soul is shattered and strewn across the cosmos, his unbound essence corrupting countless worlds! Now, a weakened, primal Eddie must journey across space and time to battle the twisted legions of The Beast, seek out the lost shards of his soul, and bring order to the realms. With each victory, and with the aid of old friends, Eddie will restore his fearsome powers as he draws ever closer to facing the Unholy foe behind his fall - and thwarting a plot to unravel all of Creation! The first official Iron Maiden comic series, based on the band's hit mobile role playing game, Iron Maiden: Legacy Of The Beast, where players battle as Eddie across the many worlds of Iron Maiden's discography, from the ancient sands of Powerslave to the far future of the Final Frontier.

Ragna is a dragon hunter along with his partner, the strongest dragon hunter Leo. He didn't have much talent at hunting dragons but he had decided to entrust his whole life for her. However he was shown the feel of true despair by his future self on what would happen if he stays weak as he is now. With that, it seems that the reaper of the dragons had now appeared earlier than the original history, but will it be enough to change future?

truyen.the_loai: Comedy, Drama, Romance, School life, Shounen., Slice of life
truyen.gioi_thieu: Yugo Hachiken aspires to live separated from his family, so he takes the initiative by enrolling in an agriculture school. He thinks, with his talent in studying, no problems will arise no matter what kind of school he attends. He is quickly proven wrong. Raised as a city boy, he is forced to uncover the inconvenient truth about agricultural life. Enjoy the story of Hachiken, as he tries to keep up with his new friends, farmers' heirs, who are already accustomed to harsh world of farming. The story of a sweat, tear, and mud-stained youth begins!

truyen.the_loai: Comedy, Drama, Ecchi, Harem, Romance, School life, Shounen.
truyen.gioi_thieu: The hero (me, Junpei Manaka!) sneaks up to the roof to see the sunset. When he opens the door, he startles a mysterious beauty. She panics and runs away, but not before Junpei has caught sight of her adorable strawberry print panties... in EXTREME close-up. With that vision forever burned into his memory, Junpei embarks on a quest to find the girl, and the panties, of his dreams!
One man has three wives? What's the deal with this greedy guy?

truyen.the_loai: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Historical, Martial arts, Mystery, Romance, Supernatural, Tragedy, Webtoons
truyen.gioi_thieu: Trainee Knight Trudia gets kicked out of the knight squad because of her hot headedness. In midst of trying to find out where she'll go next she finds an old man that's in danger. She runs over there without hesitation in order to save him only to meet a man that'll change her fate forever...! A story of a dying girl and an undying man trying their hardest to live!

truyen.the_loai: Drama, Fantasy, Historical, Romance, Supernatural, Yaoi
truyen.gioi_thieu: After many years of living alone in a deep forest, the devil has gotten lonely. He decides to buy himself a human bride to cure his loneliness as well as help him shed his devil identity. But when his new, beautiful young bride dies suddenly after only a few blissful days, the devil decides this time to build himself a bride. First on his list of items to acquire for the construction of his perfect mate: eyes...

Lin Xiaoyou, childhood friend of Xi Yu, died at the age of 14, but her spirit refused to pass onto the afterlife. Instead, she stuck around and became Yu's 'guardian angel' due to a promise she made to him. Under Xiaoyou's constant guarding, Yu hasn't had a single girlfriend even though he's already 24. Being in a proper relationship has become his goal in life, but such a simple wish brings about a series of terrifying incidents. Is Xiaoyou really a 'guardian angel', or is she actually an 'evil spirit'?!

After a night of drinking, she accidentally slept with the insidious Underworld Emperor. What to do? Run! Two years later, she's the elevator lady at China's number one business, but is always harassed by a good-looking colleague...

truyen.the_loai: Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Martial arts, Shounen.
truyen.gioi_thieu: In a world of martial arts, a young boy named Wu was unable to practice martial arts due to his special body. Will he accept his fate and live his life bullied and looked down by others, or will he rise and become a master?
